sect1.title: Quick install
sect1.para: In short installation in most cases should be very simple:

listitem.para: Unzip it into a new directory, this is where CMView will be installed
Edit the cmview.cfg file and add the path to your pymol executable in the
You are done! To run it do:
In linux: just run the cmview shell script
In Windows: double click on cmview.bat
In Mac: double click on CMView.jar

sect1.title: The details
sect1.para: The CMView application itself is just a single java archive file (jar file): CMView.jar. There is a number of external library dependencies
